title: Wire instructions
subtitle: This info tells your bank how much and where to send the wire transfer. Make sure to send a wire transferâ€”we will not accept ACH transfers. Afterwards, confirm below that you have completed this step.
requirementsTitle: What to know when wiring funds

requirements.trackingCode: You must include the unique tracking code from the wire instructions
requirements.amountMatch: The amount you send must exactly match the amount in the wire instructions
requirements.usBank: The originating bank account must be based in the US
requirements.authorized: You must be authorized to use the bank account on the company's behalf
